relationships.description: Malfoy is introduced as the new Slytherin Seeker, indicating he is a member of the Slytherin team.
Malfoy is talking on behalf of the Slytherin team, indicating he represents them.
Harry is a member of the Gryffindor team, as mentioned by Ron's question to him about why he isn't playing.
Hermione is a member of the Gryffindor team, as mentioned by Malfoy's comment about Gryffindor getting in on pure talent.
Malfoy mentions his father buying brooms for the Slytherin team, indicating he is a family member of Weasley.
